title: Enable 'Firefox view' as a new tab option
content:
Can we set it as a new tab option instead of manually clicking the button?

Currently, there's no way to achieve this with an extension thanks to malware risks preventing any add-ons from targeting the local URL (i.e. 'about::___') as a new tab.

Introducing this page as a new tab option has the potential to significantly enhance the Firefox ecosystem. It will make the transition from phone to desktop seamless, greatly improving multi-devices experiences.
creator: m61ie5l7

title: Pinned tabs disappear from main browser after using "New Private Window" feature
content: Pinned tabs disappear from main browser window AFTER using "New private window" browser to test a different site issue. This has happened a few times for me. It is very cumbersome and should not be necessary to do a problem search and see all the steps needed to follow using the sessionstore.jsonlz4 process. Why can't Firefox have simple "restore PINNED tabs" history? I am going to plan on saving each link for each pinned tab in a document of my own simply because it is EXTREMELY annoying and TIME CONSUMING to try to get each of them back. Why does the "New Private Window" use cause this issue in the main browser window?

title: Copy and Paste Issue in Firefox on macOS Sonoma 14.6
content:
Hello,

I am experiencing an issue with the copy and paste functions in Firefox on my MacBook Pro, which is running macOS Sonoma 14.6. When I attempt to use the copy and paste options from the Edit menu in Firefox, they are not working. This issue occurs specifically when I need to use these functions during tasks such as performing Google searches.

I would greatly appreciate your assistance in resolving this issue. Could you please provide any advice or solutions to help restore these functionalities?

Thank you for your support.

Best, Kam

title: Firefox not loading previous sessions
content: Recently my Firefox does not load previous tabs when I closed Firefox down at night. I tried not closing my browser and that worked a couple of days. (always shut down my computer at night and restart it in the morning.) But that even does not work now. Everytime I restart my computer and open Firefox it starts with only a blank tab. I have read all the associated questions on here and tried everything posted, but to no avail. Do I need to go to a different browser to not lose my tabs? Please give me some help because this is irritating to start Firefox and not have my previous session tabs open. AND there is NO "restore previous session" available. Going through the history to try to find the tabs I'm looking for is a pain and NOT a viable solution. Thank you for your help in advance.
creator: nonnox151

title: Firefox Sync did not restore my data
content:
Hello

Out of nowhere I started having problems watching Videos on Twitch. So, after some Flatpak repairs and reinstalls, I decided to sync my data with Firefox Sync and remove it completely. For my surprise after reinstalling and logging in on Firefox Sync my only extensions and, what looks like part of my history were restored. Lost my session, custom tabs names etc.
